column4: Hey do you guys think that you should stink with ubuntu 10.04 or go to ubuntu 10.10
i think i might go back to 10.04
personally ill stink with 10.4 for a while
thats what ill think i will do
i have to redownload it again
ill have to reinstall to use 10.04 again
but its not a big deal
Who thinks that you should stay with Ubuntu 10.04 or go to Ubuntu 10.10

nothing much but this: 1. i'am to lazy to reinstall to use 10.10, 2. i dont want to bother with some sort of upgrade that will break everything, 3. i can run 10.10 in virtual machines to play around if i need to
oh and 4. 10.04 is marked as LTS
which means it will be supported for 3 years
thats good enough for desktop for me
i'am still running two 9.10 servers btw
i think i will reinstall to Ubuntu 10.04 and start using it again
